name: Wizabeasts: Playtesting Demo
description:
STEAM PAGE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2020040/Wizabeasts

DESCRIPTION

You've joined Oscar's Academy in the hope of beating the odds and graduating! Tame wild Wizabeasts, defeat opponents in tactical battles, challenge the club champions, investigate a growing threat, and get out of debt!

INFO

This is a vertical slice of the game meant for gathering feedback. It only covers the first few areas.

CONTROL DEVICES

Keyboard

Gamepad

FEEDBACK
